mapper.select:
select di.id, di.doctor_name, di.doctor_sex, di.hospital_name, di.offices_name, di.doctor_img, di.doctor_title, di.teach_title, di.doctor_administrative, di.doctor_degree, di.doctor_forte, di.doctor_about, di.hospital_id, di.images, hi.hospital_name, hi.hospital_address from doctor_info di left join hospital_info hi on (hi.id = di.hospital_id) where 1 = 1
AND di.doctor_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{doctorInfo.doctorName},'%')
AND di.hospital_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{doctorInfo.hospitalName},'%')
AND di.offices_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{doctorInfo.officesName},'%')
